1503.TW.summary: Shihlin Electric & Engineering Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of heavy electrical equipment, electrical machinery, electrical automotive equipment, and related parts in Taiwan, Mainland China, Vietnam, and internationally. It operates through Electric Distribution, Automobile Parts, Automation Equipment and Parts, and Others segments. The company offers automobile parts, such as starters, alternators, fuel pumps, wiper systems, fan motors, warm gear motors, clutch motors, exchange position motors, washer systems, ECU products, power window switches, auto rain sensors, and blind-spot warning systems; motorcycle parts, including AC generators, starters, and fuel pumps; and DC motors, which include gear, transaxle, DC, and right angle motors. It also provides breaker switchgear and systems consist of miniature circuit breakers, molded case circuit breakers, air circuit breakers, magnetic contactors/switches, manual motor starters, surge protective devices, and automatic transfer switches; and heavy electric systems, such as power and oil immersed transformers, cast resin transformers, pad and pole mounted transformers, PT/CT products, high voltage switches, capacitors, and switchgears. In addition, the company offers factory automation products, including AC drives, HMI products, AC servo motors and drives, and temperature controllers; and automatic handling systems, as well as digital products. Further, it is involved in the operating, sale, and maintenance of vending machines; manufacture and sale of aluminum alloy die-casting, lathe, cutting, and molding products; import and export trade and agency business; competitive and recreational sports business; and sale and lease of commercial buildings. Shihlin Electric & Engineering Corp. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1504.TW.summary: TECO Electric & Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, installation, wholesale, and retail of electronic equipment, telecommunication equipment, office equipment, and home appliances worldwide. It offers low, medium, and high voltage motors; system and automation products comprising AC servo driving systems, programmable logic controllers, human-machine interfaces, and robots; electromechanical engineering and power equipment; and household and air conditioning appliances. The company also develops wind turbines, electric cars, and PV power station products; and integrates Internet of Things, and cloud-end products and systems, as well as provides solutions for smart-card applications in various fields. In addition, it manufactures and sells switches, busway and related components, touch-tone phone systems, billing boxes, generators, reducers, electric control products, and air conditioners mechanical equipment; repairs electric appliances; provides business management consulting services; invests in securities; offers fiber optic cables, interconnects, transceivers/media converters, patch cords, and LC connectors and adapters; and constructs commercial buildings. Further, the company offers investment consultancy services for domestic and foreign industrial parks and lands; communication network information technology; science park development; develops and sells software; and provides storage and energy technical services. Additionally, it engages in the real estate business; coil wound motors and hydroelectric power; international trading; commissioned sale of phone and IC cards; production of data storage and processing equipment; provision of various business documents management, printing, and other mail services; services related to information software, data processing, and electronic information supply; and import, sale, and lease of franking machines. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1507.TW.summary: Yungtay Engineering Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, construction, sale, installation, repair, and maintenance of elevators, escalators, food delivery machines, central air conditioning units, and elevator motors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers passenger, high speed, villa, machine room less, observation, medical and freight elevators, and escalators and automatic sidewalks. It is also involved in the real estate rental business. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1513.TW.long_name: Chung-Hsin Electric and Machinery Manufacturing Corp.
1513.TW.summary: Chung-Hsin Electric and Machinery Manufacturing Corp. manufactures and sells electric motors and generators in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through Electricity power, Engineering, and Service segments. It offers gas insulated switchgears, gas circuit breakers, gas insulated transmission lines and combined switchgears, fuse cutouts, load break switchgears, and low voltage switchgears; electro-mechanical, electronic single phase, and polyphase meters; and equipment for the monitoring and control of the electric facilities at power plants, wind farms, transformer stations, and distribution feeders. The company also provides precision air-conditionings for computer rooms, blowers for chiller systems, and chiller machines; alternators and diesel-electric engine sets; diesel generators; backup power fuel, cell systems; micro-grid systems; machine tool products; and precision machines for fabrication and welding, sheet metal works, surface treating, and inspection and test. In addition, it offers GIS/GCB welding tanks and enclosures, GIS/GCB aluminum casting tanks and enclosures, GIL enclosures, GIS/GCB aluminum conductors, stainless steel and aluminum vacuum chambers, and machining services and customer made parts; gas insulated transformer neutral grounding of disconnecting switch systems; DC power switchgears and neutral grounding resistors for transformers; and casting aluminum alloy conductors and pressure vessels for high-voltage GCB and ABS. Further, the company undertakes contracts for power generation and substation projects; constructs automatic parking facilities; and sells and rents residence and building properties. Additionally, it provides engineering, urban regeneration, energy management, and parking management services. The company was formerly known as Chung-Hsin Electric Factory and changed its name to Chung-Hsin Electric and Machinery Manufacturing Corp. in 1962. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1514.TW.summary: Allis Electric Co.,Ltd. produces and sells transformers, switching devices, and electronic products worldwide. The company offers uninterruptible power supply products for computers, network servers, data centers, telecommunication products, semiconductor manufacturing products, and petrochemical equipment; switching mode rectifiers and parallel inverters for telecom application; solar products; and DC power supply and battery chargers, which provide DC power equipment used in telephone exchanges, satellite base-stations, microwave links, rural telecommunications, railway switching controls, and switchgears. It also provides transmission and distribution pole line hardware and apparatus, such as switches, and transmission and distribution pole line hardware products; high-voltage metal-clad switchgears, gas-insulated switchgears, high and low voltage switchgears, motor control centers, control panels, and distribution panels; and oil-immersed, cast resin, dry type, amorphous core, and cast resin potential and current transformers. In addition, the company engages in the planning, design, installation, testing, operating manual, training, and after service on power station monitoring, as well as planning, managing, and servicing to procure, supply, and install electrical, mechanical, air-conditioning, environmental, and water drainage equipment and system projects. Its products are used in IT, telecommunication, industrial, wireless, utility, and supervisory control and data acquisition applications. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1515.TW.summary: Rexon Industrial Corp.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells bench power tools in the United States, Canada, Europe, Japan, and other Asian markets. The company offers power tools, including sawing, drilling, demolishing, grinding, polishing/sanding, cutting, planning/routing, and other products. It also provides fitness equipment, such as treadmills, as well as offers after sale services. The company was formerly known as KuoHsing Machinery Ltd. and changed its name to Rexon Industrial Corp.,Ltd in 1976. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

1528.TW.summary: Anderson Industrial Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells computer numerical control (CNC) machineries in Germany, Taiwan, China, the United States, Australia, Brazil, Thailand, and internationally. It provides single and multi-spindle circuit boards; and spindles for use in milling, engraving, mold processing, 3C glass panel processing, high-speed grinding, PCB industry, and advanced materials processing applications. The company also offers CNC routers, MONFORTS, metal cutting machines, PCB routing and tool grinding machines, CNC Akut-series, CNC Laskut-series, and print and graphic machines for aerospace, automotive, composites material, marine, railway, wood, metal processing, and other industries. In addition, it provides tooling products, precision and electronic machineries, lumber and wood panels, building materials, and plates and other products. The company also imports and exports its products. Anderson Industrial Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1530.TW.summary: Awea mechantronic co.,ltd researches, designs, manufactures, assembles, tests, monitors, sells, and services various CNC machines in Taiwan and internationally. It offers vertical, production bridge, high-speed bridge, 5-face bridge, horizontal, and 5-axis milling, as well as horizontal boring machines; and tapping and automation products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

1531.TW.summary: Kaulin Mfg. Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells industrial sewing machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include overlock; interlock; mulit-needle double chainstich; lockstitch; electric button holing; button sewing/bar-tracking; flatseamer; bandknife cutting; single thread chain-stitch button attaching; feed-off-the arm double chain stitch; cloth cutting; portable bag closer; zig-zag stitching; single, two, and three needle chainstitch; and other machines, as well as automatic sewing machines. Its machines are used in stitching various products, such as knitwear, jeans, and sportswear. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1539.TW.summary: Chiu Ting Machinery Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells bench top and stationery woodworking machinery worldwide. It offers table saw, parallelogram jointer, and snipe planer series products. The company sells its products to importers, distributors, and retailers. Chiu Ting Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1560.TW.summary: Kinik Company produces and sells various abrasives, cutting tools, and reclaimed wafers in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers various conventional grinding wheels, diamond/CBN grinding wheels, DLC coatings, reclaimed wafers, porous ceramic chuck tables, CMP diamond disks, ultra precision machining tools, dicing blades, diamond rollers, wafer grinding wheels, diamond and CBN honey comb wheels, and anti-slip type vacuum chucks. Kinik Company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1583.TW.summary: Goodway Machine Corp. develops, manufactures, and sells turning machines. It provides multi-axis turning, vertical turning, horizontal turning, swiss turning, and wheel turning products; grinders; and automation turning products, including bar feeders, gantry loading systems, loading and unloading systems, parts catchers and probes, tool presenters, and steady rests. The company offers its products through a network of dealers in Asia, the Americas, Africa, Europe, and Oceania. Goodway Machine Corp. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1590.TW.summary: AirTAC International Group, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies pneumatic equipment worldwide. The company offers standard, miniature, compact/ultracompact, multi-mounting, twin- and tri-rod, slide table, rodless, rotary table, twist clamp, clamp, unclamping, and stopper cylinders, as well as air grippers and accessories. It also provides solenoid, air, manual control, mechanical control and other, and fluid control valves; air preparation units, including F.R.L. combination, FR.L. combination, filter and regulator, filter, regulator, lubricator, soft star-up and safe on-off valve, air distribution block, drain, and pressure gauge units. In addition, the company offers accessories, such as shock absorbers, polyurethane tubings, fittings, silencers, and speed controllers; and standard digital pressure switches. Further, it provides HRBS blade swing cylinders, HFKP dust-proof pneumatic fingers, DSC cylinders, stainless mini cylinders, diaphragm cylinders; and proportional solenoid, 6D integrated, 6V400/600 solenoid, 2WA valves. Additionally, the company offers shut-off, slow open, assembled pressure regulator, quick drain, shuttle, and double pressure valves; DPH analog output digital display switches, DPS digital display air pressure switches, DPHF acid and alkali resistant digital display switches, DPSW/DPHW waterproof digital display switches, and strong magnetic sensors; standard linear guideway, LSD ball screws, dust-proof standard linear guideway, and LRW wide micro linear guideway; belt driven linear slider, screw slider, and linear module actuators; stepping and servo motors; and B60 clean products and air indicators. Its products are used in automotive, machinery manufacturing, metallurgy, electronics, environmental protection, lighting and textile, ceramics, medical equipment, food, and packaging automatic industrial fields. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2233.TW.summary: TURVO International Co., Ltd. provides modular solutions in the machining industry in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily offers precision parts for industrial use. It also provides professional metal processing services, including machining, automation integration, heat treatment, and forging. The company's products have application in auto parts, such as engine common rail parts, variable timing system parts, suspension system parts, and other parts; medical parts comprising insulin syringe parts; bike hubs, shock absorber, etc.; industrial components that include various industrial use sleeves, connecting rings, compressor parts, etc.; and optical lens, which comprise connecting rings and cum to lens applications. TURVO International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

2421.TW.long_name: Sunonwealth Electric Machine Industry Co., Ltd.
2421.TW.summary: Sunonwealth Electric Machine Industry Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision motors, mini fans, and thermal modules worldwide. The company offers DC fans and blowers, AC and EC fans, customized solutions, and fan trays; LED cooling solutions, such as active cooling modules and fans; and fan accessories, such as metal finger guards, plastic guards, metal filter guards, plastic filter guards, and AC cords; and ventilation fans under the SUNON brand. It serves automobile electronic, optical electronic, and network communication industries. Sunonwealth Electric Machine Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2464.TW.summary: Mirle Automation Corporation manufactures and sells automation system integrators and related products. It offers automated equipment for clean room FPD transporter and material-handling, such as CF in-line C/V systems, LCD/LCM auto packing/palletizing systems, clean room stockers, burr checkers, bonders, LD/ULD and CSLD products, dense packing/unpacking systems, in-line aging systems, and equipment for clean room robot applications; and robotic application systems for general, optronic, and semiconductor industries. The company also provides IT products, including IBM systems, servers, bladecenters, and storage and system networking products, as well as POS products; storage management, enterprise asset management, virtualization infrastructure, security, and AS/RS system solutions; and IT services comprising virtual desktop infrastructure, Oracle DB technical support, server and Linux integration and virtualization, warranty maintenance, virtualized storage management, enterprise project management, and enterprise private cloud management services. In addition, it offers servo drivers, injection molding controllers, and air condition system controllers, as well as controllers for various industries; and clean room automatic and general environmental material handling systems, and ancillary systems. Further, the company provides special purpose equipment, such as optical glass molding presses, liquid management auto samplers, and food industry machinery. It serves the FPD, semiconductor, automobile, IT, machinery, food, solar cell, LED, and touch panel industries. Mirle Automation Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2476.TW.summary: G-SHANK Enterprise Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells precision progressive dies and stamped metal parts worldwide. Its products are used in molding, automotive, medical, and industrial parts; electronics components; and automotive cameras. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3167.TW.summary: Taliang Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor inspection, resin panel cutters, and CNC engraving and milling machines in Taiwan. It provides optoelectronics, including glass panel processing machinery for touch panel, cover glass, sensor glass, or one glass processing applications; automatic edge coating machines; and PCB routing and drilling machines. The company also offers semiconductor inspection solution comprising FVI for carrier tape inspection; IR reel, semi-auto IR, and IR wafer for sidewall chipping around the die inspection; PRIM HBM for HBM chip type in reel inspection; wafer map that replaces human eye inspection of map; and testing handler for QFN/DFN/SOT/SOP IC inspection and packaging. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4526.TW.summary: Tongtai Machine & Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machines worldwide. The company offers machine tools, such as vertical machining, 5-axis machining, tapping, horizontal machining, 5-axis horizontal machining, multi-tasking turning, and ultrasonic assisted machining centers, as well as boring and milling machines, horizontal and vertical CNC lathes, and wheel machines; and PCB machines, including drilling and routing machines. It also provides laser drilling and marking machines; and additive manufacturing machines consisting of metal powder direct energy deposition and subtractive manufacturing, metal powder bed fusion, and sand binder jetting machines. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4532.TW.summary: Rechi Precision Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells compressors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers inverter and constant-speed rotary compressors; BLDC motors; inverter controllers; and heat pump water heaters. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4572.TW.summary: Drewloong Precision, Inc. produces and sells aero structural and engine parts, landing gear parts, and special tools to aircraft manufacturers. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

6215.TW.summary: Aurotek Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automation and robotic components under the Aurotek brand in Japan, rest of Asia, Europe, and the United States. Its products include automation and robotics components, such as motors, reducers, sensors, PLC controllers, couplings, ball screws, linear axis actuators, linear bearing systems, motion controllers, motion control ICs, CNC systems, robot control systems, visual identity systems, automatic guided vehicles, self-lube bearings, precision stages, wicking materials, electric blowers, and environmental equipment. The company also offers FA and equipment comprising PCB depaneling systems, robot systems, optical communication machines, DeMeet 3D CNC coordinate measuring machines, and electric screw drivers; and patterning technology and applications, patterned technology and equipment, automatic optical inspection equipment, and laser processing equipment. In addition, it provides isolation and damping devices, natural ventilation systems, and EcoColor external venetian blinds. The company provides solutions to self-lubricated parts; transmissions; power transmissions; drive systems; controllers and robotics for PCB, SMT, LCD, optical, solar, and semiconductor equipment; architectural applications/designs for window operators; seismic isolation systems; and anti-earthquake devices. Aurotek Corporation was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6438.TW.summary: Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures automation system solutions. The company offers automation equipment for printed circuit board, flexible board, IC substrate and packaging, high density interconnect board, and ceramic substrate applications. It is also involved in the design and provision of customized machines for applications in laser technology equipment, TFT-LCD flat panel screens, LEDs, touch panels, and LGP; and wafer, cell, and module manufacturing machines, including inspection systems, as well as intelligent automation integration services. The company was formerly known as SCHMID Automation Asia Co., Ltd. Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6706.TW.summary: Fittech Co.,Ltd provides automatic equipment and system integration services for the optoelectronic, semiconductor, and laser industries. The company offers LED probing and testing equipment, including LED chip and wafer probing and testing systems; fully automatic LED wafer prober systems; auto flip-chip probers; auto LED chip probers and tester; high accuracy automatic chip counters; and automatic detaching tape systems. It also provides LD probing and testing equipment, such as VCSEL(PD) probing and testing systems, and edge emitting laser probing and sorting systems; and laser micromachining equipment comprising automatic dual-arm laser wafer and laser wafer marking systems, fully-auto laser marking (inking) systems, and semi-auto PCB laser drilling systems, as well as semi-auto laser cutting, drilling, and scribing systems. In addition, the company offers laser metal machining equipment, including handheld laser cleaning and welding machines; and OEM and LED OEM services. Its products are also used in other photonics and optics, electronics, automotive, and manufacturing industries. The company operates in Taiwan, China, and rest of Asia, as well as internationally. Fittech Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8996.TW.summary: Kaori Heat Treatment Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells heat exchanger solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers brazed plate heat exchangers for use in HVAC, refrigeration, cooling, heating, heat recovery, green energy, and other industries, as well as for residential applications; and accessories, such as connectors, flanges, insulation foams, and stud bolts. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
